name: Pizza Delivery (Daverinoe)
description:
GAME EXPORT NOT WORKING. Sorry everyone.

However, if you really want to play it, it does play from the editor (at least on my computer it does). It needs Godot 4.0 beta 3, and the source code is available here.

An attempt at a short horror game about delivering a pizza. WASD to move, move your mouse to aim around, and TAB to check your pizza box instructions, ESC to escape!

This entry uses the Stay in the Light/Dark wildcard.

HINT: Stay in the light!

WARNING: The ritual circle acts as a strobing light at one point.

Unfortunately, I had no time to add quality of life features, like settings, mappable controls, menus, etc. In fact, while you could play this in web format, it looks like garbage, so we can't even do that. Sorry.

Made in Godot for the Godot Wild Jam #50.

Cultist model by Liioni
Pizza box logo by Lavie

Car and Tree model purchased from Kenney's packs

Car Engine idling Sound Effect free from Pixabay

All other sounds were purchased from sound packs, and have appropriate licenses.
